title: Investors | GSK
description: From quarterly updates to key announcements, here you can access GSK investor-related information
cleaned_text: Investors 2023 Second quarter announcement We announced our second quarter 2023 results on Wednesday 26 July. Access our Q2 2023 results and latest Annual Report below. We're confident in our future Our bold ambitions for patients are reflected in our commitments to a step-change in growth and performance over the period to 2026. This means more GSK vaccines and medicines, including innovative new products, will reach more people than ever before. Speeches and presentations Getting ahead of Infectious Disease with GSK management [Watch webcast recordings](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLvDyxtKlIcnjFWjCU3fYGhbzwz9w8WnCz) The virtual event featured a presentation, four breakout sessions and an interactive Q&A. Recordings of all sessions are available on demand. Goldman Sachs' 44th Annual Global Healthcare Conference [Listen to the webcast](https://event.webcasts.com/starthere.jsp) Tony Wood, Chief Scientific Officer, discussed progress made in R&D during a fireside chat on Tuesday, 13 June at 9:20am PT/12:20pm ET/5:20pm UK during Goldman Sachs' 44th Annual Global Healthcare Conference, in Dana Point, California. ESG Investor Education Event (Clinical Trial Diversity) [Watch the webinar replay](https://gsk.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_wkI290t1Rgmo3s7xVs7cdA#/registration) Alberto Fernandez, SVP of Global Clinical Operations at GSK and Dr Kimberly Smith, SVP and Head of R&D at ViiV Healthcare, provided insights on the importance of clinical trial diversity including support from a 17-year retrospective study. During the 45 minute session, the leaders also provided an overview of GSK's work to ensure clinical trials reflect the populations most impacted by a disease and explored a HIV case study that demonstrated the power of clinical trial diversity in action. The presentation was followed by an opportunity for audience Q&A. 41st annual JP Morgan Healthcare Conference [Download audio (MP3 - 17.6MB)](/media/9858/gsk-jpm-presentation-10-jan-2023.mp3) Emma Walmsley, Chief Executive Officer, presented at the 41st annual JP Morgan Healthcare Conference on 10 January 2023. The 40 minute session included a presentation and a moderated Q&A discussion.
